about_the_game:
You might have noticed that we have changed our game name from 'Gravity Royale' to: 'Z-Grav: Clash'. With this new name, we would like to emphasize more intense combat elements rather than just Battle Royale.

Z-Grav: Clash is the first Fly-‘n-Shoot battle royale built on Unreal Engine 5. Soar, grapple, and shoot anytime and anywhere in varied futuristic landscapes. Experience stunning graphics and easy-to-learn controls in unparalleled VR deathmatch. Get ready to FLY & SHOOT your way to triumph!

Fly and Shoot, Define Your Legend


Wanna feel what it's like to fly like Spiderman and Shoot like a marksman? Unleash breathtaking aerial moves as you navigate the three-dimensional battlegrounds. Scale walls, leap across rooftops, and engage in thrilling vertical combats that offer you a whole new battle royale experience like never before!

A Wealth of Physics based Sci-fi Weaponry


You can choose from a vast array of sci-fi weapons, from pistols, rifles to shotguns and more, each catering to your combat style. Each firearm offers a distinct handling experience with the utmost realism in gunfights! Customize your arsenal by attaching items you scavenge in the game. Prepare for the hunt and discover weapons tailored to your playstyle.

Dive into Real-time Multiplayer Showdowns


Team up with friends or challenge players worldwide in heart-pounding, real-time multiplayer shootouts. Strategize, communicate, and showcase your shooting skills to emerge victorious in every epic battle.

A Futuristic World is Your Playground


Immerse yourself in a futuristic world where advanced technology and otherworldly environments collide. From exquisitely scenic tundra plain to the most livable and bustling central community, each area offers epic skirmishes with its own risks and rewards for you to discover.

Gear up, take aim, and FLY & SHOOT your way out! Your legend in Z-Grav: Clash begins.
detailed_description:
Beta Date Confirmed! We are planning to start Beta on Mar 21 (EST). It will last at least 2 weeks and it only supports Meta Quest 2 and 3, both on PCVR and Standalone.


Join us:

name: Z-Grav: Clash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inteli5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIAGTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC

*languages with full audio support
